snippet: The Internal Revenue Service on Tuesday unveiled a Taxpayer Bill of Rights that is intended to ensure the rights to privacy, confidentiality and a fair appeals process with the agency.
abstract: Internal Revenue Service unveils a Taxpayer Bill of Rights that is intended to ensure the rights to privacy, confidentiality and a fair appeals process in dealings with the agency.
lead_paragraph: The Internal Revenue Service on Tuesday unveiled a Taxpayer Bill of Rights that is intended to ensure the rights to privacy, confidentiality and a fair appeals process with the agency.

headline.main: I.R.S. Publishes Guide It Says Will Help Ensure Taxpayer Rights
headline.print_headline: I.R.S. Publishes Guide It Says Will Help Ensure Taxpayer Rights
